documents.document:
Friday night

Friday night stuck in everyones bad night in yeah.. well its a great night in for me. Every friday night im out,and its cold.So this friday its staying in woop,tomorrow got town with abi + her baby..not its not real its electronice its a school project.Im singlee guys..yeah i hate it.. i want a prefect boyfriend you no the one thats caring funny loveable.. cute i love writng these things its what i would normaly wright in my diary but yeah thats full.School hate it so much! im done with these people i want new ones all these people here are so fake & mean some are ok.. but others arrghhh! if you dont look right or your hairs not perfect & you like someone thats say not to populer you would be automatickly hated... yeah thats england for you =]

Soo cold..

the days are getting colder & colder + i just want the winter to be over & done with and for it to be summer again. The nights are so cold & waking up in the morning for school is arrghh i just hate it.Christmas yeah christmas i love it all your family & friends and presents & food whats not to like about christmas..exept the spending money on your smleey aunt bit haha.Im so bored my moms in a stressy with me ..as always its all good tho. New top from primark alert..black and white..white with like black flowers on it it was Â£3.00 bargain hunter
keep reading becuase i have no life

Sleepover..

sleepvers are great right i love them have them nearly every weeknd but this weekend i was walking home at 3 o clock in the morning..dont worry il keep you gueesing on why becuase its a long story. i love love songs its my favourate type of music everyone loves hip hop and rnb dont get me rong i love them but i love love songs when i have someone to think abut when im listening to them say a boy... and i love romantic boys haha... i hate the boys that are like lets have sex ..im like no i love the boys that hug you fron behind txt u at night just to say i love you and goodnight boys that take lots of pictures with you and are fine with kisses.being single sucks... i no im young everyone telss me i wil find someeone..i just hope i do.

Hyper

Katie = hyper yes i get hyper when in with stace.Potatoe salad!..yum whos ever ate it on the bus i have and stacey were weird.WHile traveling at 60 miles an hour going over speed bumps on a double decker coming back from tesco for 40p after traveling round brake farm. Arrghh i need a boyfriend so fucking bad! and i love cheese..the word the smell the taste the couler the shape the form the texture.I hate people at my school !

?

-Hey all you bloggers its me well heres a big shocker my mom got her heart brocken, again yes were starting of on a new adventure thats my moms word for running away. By some mirical my mom only got oen speeding ticket the whole way he should wright her a ticket for wreckless flirting.I wil say one thing though for those who havent already put must see new york skyline on things to do befor you die.

The sad thing is imn geting good at this if all else fails i have a very promising job as a professional mover. My mom calls it home i call it the witness relocation programme.its gettin late and i got to get ready for school even though i hate it.
Keep reading my online journel of days of a life of a teenage gypsie its the same me just a different zip code.

?

- first days an new schools always feel the same like your on a new planet breathing a new atmosphere.

my mom should try and think that her perfect man is around the corner somehwere

Shes doing it again only this time i cant smile and play along becuase the truth is im tired of bubble wrap and change of adress cards ,of figuiring out new towns and finidng new friends its just not fun anymore its just not.

Looks like mom was right stayin turned out to be the greatest adventure of all & let me tell you it has made me do some crazy things, like plan ahed ,paint my room and hang pictures i mean i used a nail and everything.
can you belive it i have finally seteld down now i dont only have a homepage i have a home.

-moon
- its a little peice of magic that comes out every night to tell you that every day holds potentiol for beuty

Parents evening

The day i hate the most...oops my grades are slipping.. but its all good becuase i dont need r.s for childcare do i. weekend going to be so good..excited already.Jade (my neice ) is so annoying i dont no were amanda found her i think in a dumbster in prortland somewhere.shes so weird!

They say that love is friendship on fire and they say save a bed fall asleep in his arms &+ they say Love doesn't make the world go round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile, love.. such a strange thing when i was little i used to think urrghhh coodies haha but now all i want to do is be loved my that peroson i love more than anything.. i want him to hold me so close i can here his heartbeat and when we sleep together he stays awake listning to me breathing.

its getting late and im going to go grab something to eat .. becuase yes stacey im fat

?

- special message to all you bloggers out there being raised by single moms give the old lady a break shes doing the best she can.

STACEYYYYY - MY SISTER

i have never been so close to someone that dont go my school and is like 3 years older than me.I trust you with like everything and your alway there for me + helps me out with stuff.Shes a gay + she licks bum but i loves her loads + i couldnt imagine life without her she is my sister at the end of the day we have arguments but none mean anything,i mean she is one of the funnyst,caring,weird,pretty girls i no arnt i lucky shes mine bitches .
so many memories in like 2 years! its crazyyyyy talkk.The partys the piss ups the random times we been out + about there all memorable..never bored when im with you. bless euro shopper.... omg ive never met anyone like you &+ i never wants to loose you becuase life without you is like no life atall. -_- your like the pee in my pants everyoen else can see it but only i can feel it im cool so stacee ur such a bum &+ your so weird &+ u go hyper on kick which is HALF PRICE and u makes me laugh and ur just 1 of a kind lovee youu so much ?
+ make sure we drink kick on friday

Winter...

i guees life is good at them moment,well i cant exactly say its bad becuase it aint.I have great friends..new clothes ,a boy im interested in... and school well it inst that bad just a few crap lessons but we all get them once & a while dont we.I figuired something out today.. Nobody is perfect so i can go to school with no make up on the people i care about thta go my school wont care & i dont care about anyone else.. i have no1 to impress at school so why does it matter.I love all my friends so much.. they just make my life worth living and i just hope they no i love them so much & i wouldnt want to loose them ever! & the girls at my school that wear make up everyday piles & piles are just slags really. i just hate them why do they have to do that look perfect for school! hah! well anyway i aint wasting my time writing about them losers wait..wait Losers<<capital L got that of stacie

?

the days go past so fast now that im happy with my life..happy im with gary.. yes gary dont get me started i likes this boy so much after not even a week of going out with him hes like i duno i cant imagine not begin with him now i havent felt this thing befor... anyway me and stace and gary went to his last friday was so good and this fridayw ere going warner village goin to be the effin sex mate i love stace so much she smellss nice anyway. have a nice life

FRIDAY NIGHTSS ?

the little crew Katiee .. stacee garry &+ jonny the best people evaa me & gary stace and jonny love the friday nights all warm cuddled up on the sofa watching scary films and titanic ay stacee! last night i was in bed with gary.. laying on him like cuddeld into him and for some reason i just wanted to say i love you.. but if i did what would his reaction be... why did i want to sa it.. do i love him ? ive been with him 7 days... liked him for like 10 but can you love someone in that amount of time...hes so nice and i just feel comftorable with him kissing me on the head and saying night babe sleep well .... and playing with my hair and whispering stuf to me in my ear.... then we have laughs.... FIIT!! hes like my best friend aswel... ive got all his clothes ... LOVEE YOU STACEE BIG SISTERR X

Im backk

Hey i haven been on this for ages..well in that time i have been through so much..heart break from boys.. broke friends with many + changed for the worst ! if anyone i have hurt is reading this..im sorry seriosly ..sorry from my heart + life hasnt been worse than now its getting back on track a bit .. but this is for stacie staceee .. we argue a the time! but like you said you always regret argueing with me ! i always regret it aswell! i really have missed you + its not been the same you no being hyper writng blogs about each other + but seeing you ever day now i havent seen u in ages + if i do its not the samee "awkwad silence" .. i no we should of never broke friends im just stubborn + i want you backk becuasee life isnt the samee i dont feel right + i need you here telling me im fat + going beliver + bus journeys + tesco + potatoe salad + out + aboutt + i want u round minee making my room a mess + niking my hair clipss round mine every friday goin out meeting me from school..just im sorry ..ok xx

Primarkk

Town today after school with my mumyyy a trip to primark spent 65 poundd lol i got nearly a hole new closet + im changin my style yes its not punky with a cool edge becuase i dont want to be boring and get stuff everyone else gets im saving up for a pair of converse if u dont like it well suck my nob.
Im singleee + i want a boyfrined but not to botherd atm got more inportant stuff like satss + picking my options + payingg money of for mine + hollies holiday to holland on july 7th jelouse much i think so!

My mum + i are really close im so lucky to have her

Hollieee :)

Well hollie came round today after school but lets start of with school..
Sasha + the wana be sasha..leah is so not her friend we was having a right argument with her! she is like arrghh so annoyingg + i had all good lessons me + sasha are closer than ever + me + hollie are to she came round after school + we watchedd scary stuff on youtube like cool kids that we areee

Schoool :)

Its 7;30 in the mornings and im getting ready for school..so bored but on the brighter side its friday + i have 3 essays + 3 pratical works hvaing to be in on monday so im getting a bit stressed about that !

School iks ok we have 2 new girls one is a bitchyy gobyy slag and one is a quitee nice person lol well im off so straighten my hairr i got new straightners remmington there as good as ghds byee xx
